name: SD Battle v0.2
description:
Thank you for checking this game out :)!!

This is an early stage of a Rogue-like/lite card battler with original rules (prototype)

The rooms are generated procedurally, with only a few types of rooms for now, but will be added more later on. 

This build has been made until the 4th floor. After that everything repeats.

<Rules>

Pair of cards make up a hand.

Royal Pair > Number Pair > sum of 10 > High Card(by Ones place only)

There are several special rules for turns and twists - please check the ? button during battle for details.

Please let me know how you think about it, and add to collection if you think it's got potential. 

I'm not a professional developer, I'm making this as a hobby AND this is my first game so criticism or any sort of comments are welcome!

I've used many great free assets from itch.io 

LuizMelo - Enemies

Elthen's Pixel Art Shop - Enemy

Clembod - Protagonist

0x72 - Weapons 

(Please let me know if I missed any)
